entry.title: [SQ] According to [this graph ](https://nitter.net/QuarantinedCoof/status/15461851456
entry.content: According to [this graph ](https://nitter.net/QuarantinedCoof/status/1546185145698353154#m), Biden's approval rating took a big dip after the Afghanistan pullout. Why? I thought people generally wanted the US to pull out.
